title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Cook the pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together.
Mix pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture off heat.
Serve with extra parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Fry onions, then add tomato puree and spices.
Stir in cream and simmer.
Add chicken and cook for 10 minutes before serving.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter and sugars.
Beat in egg and vanilla.
Mix in flour and chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Chop the romaine lettuce.
Toss with croutons and Caesar dressing.
Top with shaved parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and easy stir-fry with beef and vegetables.
instructions: Marinate beef in soy sauce, oyster sauce, and cornstarch.
Stir-fry beef until browned.
Add sliced bell pepper and onion, cook until tender.
Serve with rice or noodles.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients together.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.
Serve with syrup or toppings of choice.
